title: Our Top Lighting Stores for an Ambience Upgrade
description: From bathroom lighting to modern floor lamps, switching out your lighting design is an easy way to refresh your space
author: Erika Owen, Julia Harrison
byline: Erika Owen, Julia Harrison, Soleil Summer
excerpt: From bathroom lighting to modern floor lamps, switching up lighting design is an easy way to refresh your space—and the best lighting stores have you covered.
text: The first step in refreshing any home’s ambiance is taking a trip to the best lighting stores online (or in your area). One of the quickest ways to level up your home is by upgrading your lighting options, whether you’re renovating or moving into a new space. And now it’s easier than ever thanks to the many online lighting stores that make it possible to find exactly what you’re looking for without a trip to a showroom.Even the most naturally well-lit homes require lighting fixtures for creating the perfect atmosphere, entertaining guests, and working late into the evening. And while it may feel daunting to sift through the many lighting options out there, we’ve highlighted our favorites to get you started.Ahead, we share the top-rated lighting stores for high-quality options for modern table lamps, sculptural floor lamps, crystal chandeliers, lighted ceiling fans, and desk lamps, all with plenty of personality. There’s something for every interior and a wide variety of price points, whether you’re looking for new lighting at affordable prices or high-end conversation pieces.Shop Our Top Picks:Affordable Lighting Refresh Pick: WayfairInterior Designer’s Favorite: RejuvenationBest for Modern Lighting: LumensBest for Bedside Upgrade: CastleryBest Personality Pick: SchoolhouseBest Boho Pick: Serena & LilyWayfairMercer41 Dimmable Floor LampAllModern Davita 3 ChandelierThe great thing about Wayfair is its massive selection of lighting. From bathroom light fixtures and mini pendant lights to table lamps and living room flush mounts, the retailer has something on offer. We lost ourselves (in a good way) among all of the track lighting—it’s time to finally say goodbye to that dated set hanging over your kitchen island and usher in a new vibe. With frequent clearance sales, this is also our go-to when it comes to saving big on practically anything for your home.RejuvenationFolk Abigail Large Soft Cone Semi-Flush Pendant LightCoridon Task Floor LampThe lighting designs offered at Rejuvenation will appeal to all tastes, whether you favor natural, ceramic materials, or smooth metals. The online retailer offers a great variety of outdoor lighting as well, if you’re looking to imbue some farmhouse-chic style into your exterior. At Rejuvenation you can also stock up on lighting accessories, like shades and smart LED light bulbs. Because many of Rejuvenation’s pieces come with a higher price tag, we recommend shopping here for large statement-making pieces that will become the focal point of your space.LumensBellhop Table Lamp by Edward Barber, Jay Osgerby for FLOSAir Table Lamp by Ray Power for LZFFrom kitchen to ceiling lights, Lumens—which recently merged with YLighting—focuses on modern options for brightening up your space. The designs span a wide variety of materials, from metals and woods to more fragile woven textiles. Plus you can even find landscape lighting for your entryway, backyard, and any other outdoor spot that needs extra illumination.SchoolhouseArbor Floor LampSchoolhouse x Clare V. Piet Table LampSchoolhouse takes classic lighting shapes—pendants, circular flush mounts, tree-shaped table lamps—and gives them a bit of a one-up with fun colors and functional improvements. For example, a simple wall pendant gets a convenient makeover with a plug-in functionality and style inspired by Shaker designs. The brand is a great option for anyone into midcentury modern, Bauhaus, and similar design styles, but they’re not so trendy that you’ll want to swap them out after a few years.Serena & LilySavannah Flush MountBar Harbor Bone Inlay Table LampOne of the quickest ways to add visual interest to your living room or dining room is to incorporate an unexpected texture into your lighting design. Serena & Lily has a lot to choose from in this category, from woven wicker pendants to scalloped hanging lights. The vibe skews a bit bohemian and beachy, and it’s a great place to find a statement piece to help anchor your room.CastleryNadia Ceramic Table LampFaro Sculptural Floor LampCastlery’s selection of lighting is small but mighty, offering table and floor lamps that are perfectly suited for minimalist or Scandi-inspired interiors. You’ll notice lots of marble, ceramic, and wood bases, which make any room feel more natural. And while the lighting is certainly on the trendy side, we appreciate that each feels timeless thanks to the neutral hues and smooth silhouettes.ArticleGemma Rice Flushmount Ceiling LightLeap Black SconceIf you know you want modern decor, Article has a nice, curated selection of lighting that feels decidedly so. Each piece, whether it’s a floor lamp or table lantern like the Kana lamp above, won’t overpower your other decor but will still add a touch of warmth and style. Rattan pendants give tropical vibes, while ceramic terrazzo table lamps are fun for minimalist spaces.Lulu & GeorgiaBemand Table LampRicardo SconceLulu & Georgia has a chokehold on home design lovers, and for good reason. Each piece of furniture and decor is thoughtfully designed to make your space feel warmer and cozy. Their lighting options span categories, but you’ll find common themes, like dark wood bases and accents, rattan shades, and sculptural and organic shapes. The pendants and chandeliers are particularly striking and look perfect over a dining table or bed.AmazonMagnetic Motion Sensor LightsEDISHINE Tripod Table LampMuch like Wayfair, you could spend days perusing the lighting options on Amazon. To make your search easier, zero in on a specific design element—like “glass lighting pendant”—to find a unique option at an affordable price. Another major perk to Amazon is that you can likely pick it up at your door faster than any other retailer. So, if you’re in a pinch or want to make a design switch-up ASAP, this is the ultimate hub for easy shopping and quick shipments.EtsyHandmade ChandelierHandmade Wooden Vintage Table LampThe true magic of Etsy is that you can search for—and find—anything you’ve been looking for or dreamed up in your mind. Vintage or new, somehow, somewhere, it’s bound to be on Etsy. This pink mesh chandelier would perfectly suit a lively dining space, and this classic table lamp is a great bedside option.GantriMuka Design Lab Argizari Table LightFilippo Mambretti Noah Wall LightHead to Gantri for the bold pops of color, perfect for livening up a dining room or a kid’s room. Spanning table, floor, and wall lights, this retailer injects a burst of personality into its cute and quirky designs—perfect for the young at heart. Plus the brand is known for using plant-based materials in its work instead of harmful plastics. Swap out a boring wall sconce or standard pendant with one of Gantri’s unique shapes and that might just satiate your desire to redecorate.AnthropologieLulu Judarn Floor LampInizio Table LampIf your taste leans classic, vintage, and ornate, Anthropologie’s stunning lighting options should be your first stop. Rather than looking at lighting as a finishing touch to your home aesthetic, the retailer makes original, focal-point worthy lamps, sconces, and chandeliers that you might just center your whole room around. This milk glass bubble pendant, for example, adds a polished, elegant touch to a dark hallway or living room.MitziJaimee Floor LampAisa Plug-in SconceYour home’s lighting should be fun; that may mean mixing and matching various materials…or opting for vanity lighting with a fun shape. Mitzi covers all of the bases, from simple sconces to pastel-hued chandeliers. Not to mention there are few flower-shaped, retro-inspired vanities that are this chic. And you can trust that they know a thing or two, because the brand specializes in lighting.CB2Nicholas Obeid Astr Wall SconcePolar White Cement Floor Lamp By Kara MannCB2’s curation of lighting focuses on big, bold, and handsome shapes. Large floor lamps, striking marble outdoor sconces, and brass pendants promise a dramatic but tasteful addition to your home. It’s a great middle-of-the-road option in terms of affordability, and because there are hundreds of lighting options to choose from, you’re pretty much guaranteed to find something that perfectly suits you.GreenrowRecycled Glass PendantExtending Taper Candle HolderGreenrow offers some exceptional cottagecore options for those who can’t stop thinking of the Cotswolds. Their sconce shade collection is particularly cute, and we can’t get enough of their pleated lampshades. And, though it might not be a lamp, the extending taper candle holder is a real standout on the site.Urban OutfittersOrange Table LampLittle Glass Table LampThe ever rotating stock at Urban Outfitters is a good place to keep on the lookout for trendy table and floor lamps. From modern designs and textured lampshades to vintage-inspired silhouettes and ceramic task lamps, Urban Outfitters is a single stop that will appeal to many different lighting style preferences. The retailer specializes in kitsch and small space-friendly pieces, so scroll through if you’re looking for a teeny table lamp or tomato-shaped task light.McGee & CoVedruna Table LampDanica Wicker PendantIf you consider yourself a person with classic taste—classic, neutrals, nothing fussy, nothing loud—McGee & Co is worth a deep dive. Their offerings span reasonable price points for both quality materials and stylistic longevity. The beauty of a classic look is that you’ll never tire of it. A wicker pendant is always going to look right above the broad kitchen table in a beach house, and the tasteful Mollino Semi-Flush Mount will always suit a foyer. And if you’re just looking to spruce up a side table, they have an ample table lamp collection, which we’ve featured in our dedicated roundup.Lamps PlusPortable Table LampTorchiere Floor LampTrust us, there is a world of ceiling fan designs out there. Lamps Plus is a great retailer for upgrading your fan situation, among many other things. The options lean more sculptural and will add a solid dose of texture and intrigue to your home decor. This is what we call lighting design, not just choosing yet another run-of-the-mill ceiling fan.Joss & MainLillian Ceramic Table LampCeramic Table LampIf affordability is your main concern but you still have an eye for excellent design, Joss & Main does the practically impossible and combines budget-friendliness with chic pieces. The lighting styles are similar to what you’ll find at West Elm and CB2, with lots of metal shades, brass accents, arched silhouettes, and versatile shapes.Pottery BarnEverett Tube SconceEaston Forged-Iron Table LampA tried-and-true source in the world of home essentials, Pottery Barn has it all—and that includes a top-notch selection of lighting. The brand even offers different collections with various types of lighting options in each one, guaranteeing that everything from your chandelier to desk lamp has a cohesive style. We also like Pottery Barn’s option to book a free design consultation if you’re moving into a new space and are feeling overwhelmed with all of the design possibilities.West ElmRibbed Glass Table LampLouis Table LampThe stock at West Elm is constantly updated, but you can always count on finding high-quality lighting options with a few quirky bursts of color thrown in, just for fun. We love West Elm’s lighting designs because it’s easy to stick to a color theme while switching up the shape and form of your lights from room to room. This is also a great place to look for items with a midcentury-modern feel to them. And for more guidance through the process, you can book an appointment to meet with an expert (virtually, in a store, or at your home) to talk through your lighting plans and any other home design decisions.IKEAVarmblixt Table / Wall LampIsjakt Floor Uplighter / Reading LampForever our Scandinavian-design favorite, IKEA has a world of options when it comes to lighting design for your home. The retailer has designs for each room, spanning low-light floor lamps for an ultracozy ambiance to superbright LED options for work spaces. Within this category, you can find everything from classic lighting options to more off-the-wall, statement-making styles—all for surprisingly low prices.1stDibsButterflies Ceiling by Studio GlustinFiori Sconces Signed by Jacques Jarrige (Set of 2)Classic, modern, Bauhaus, maximalist… 1stDibs has any style you’re looking to add to your home. Heavily featured in our Open Door series, this retailer is a near-and-dear resource for interior designers searching for authentic vintage pieces. If Etsy’s a resource for everything you can think up, 1stDibs is a resource for everything you couldn’t begin to fathom—like this flush mount butterfly chandelier or these serpentine Fiori sconces.AllModernMills PendantRochelle Bath BarWhile AllModern, a Wayfair company, offers just as many options as its parent retailer, the aesthetic is more focused on minimal and—you guessed it—modern designs. Many of the designs are offered in lighting collections, meaning you can carry a singular lighting design scheme throughout your entire home for a cohesive design feel.Design Within ReachTom Dixon Bell LampGubi Grasshopper Floor LampIf you’ve read our stories before, you know we’re suckers for Design Within Reach (also known as DWR). From the retailer’s stock of Eames chairs to their array of midcentury furnishings, we can’t get enough. Lighting-wise, luxury wall sconces, sleek ceiling fans, and unique table lamps are among the wide selection of lighting options available. The options available are as unique as they are timeless, and you can find something for nearly any corner of your home.Herman MillerNelson Saucer Bubble PendantNelson Cigar Lotus Table LampThe best-selling pieces from the Nelson Bubble Collection, including this pendant ceiling light, are made to create a soft glow in any room. You can find several contemporary designs—for lighting, furniture, and more—like these across Herman Miller’s site.HemAlphabeta Pendant UnoKnuckle Table LampHem’s clever use of bold colors flanked by neutral hues adds some visual interest to your lighting without going overboard. The retailer offers a handful of shapes when it comes to its pendant lighting in a world of color combinations. This is great, since you can mimic the same shape from room to room while swapping color palettes.NoguchiAkari 24NAkari 2XIt just wouldn’t be an article on lighting if Isamu Noguchi’s paper lanterns didn’t make an appearance. While there are a million dupes circulating the internet, we wouldn’t trust the quality or avant-garde designs of Noguchi from anyone except his namesake museum shop. Akari 1A and Akari 7A are classics, but his canon includes playful shapes and colors at work for the more lighthearted space.
html:
The first step in refreshing any home’s ambiance is taking a trip to the best lighting stores online (or in your area). One of the quickest ways to level up your home is by upgrading your lighting options, whether you’re renovating or moving into a new space. And now it’s easier than ever thanks to the many online lighting stores that make it possible to find exactly what you’re looking for without a trip to a showroom.

Even the most naturally well-lit homes require lighting fixtures for creating the perfect atmosphere, entertaining guests, and working late into the evening. And while it may feel daunting to sift through the many lighting options out there, we’ve highlighted our favorites to get you started.

Ahead, we share the top-rated lighting stores for high-quality options for modern table lamps, sculptural floor lamps, crystal chandeliers, lighted ceiling fans, and desk lamps, all with plenty of personality. There’s something for every interior and a wide variety of price points, whether you’re looking for new lighting at affordable prices or high-end conversation pieces.

Shop Our Top Picks:

  • Affordable Lighting Refresh Pick: Wayfair
  • Interior Designer’s Favorite: Rejuvenation
  • Best for Modern Lighting: Lumens
  • Best for Bedside Upgrade: Castlery
  • Best Personality Pick: Schoolhouse
  • Best Boho Pick: Serena & Lily

Wayfair

Mercer41 Dimmable Floor Lamp

AllModern Davita 3 Chandelier

The great thing about Wayfair is its massive selection of lighting. From bathroom light fixtures and mini pendant lights to table lamps and living room flush mounts, the retailer has something on offer. We lost ourselves (in a good way) among all of the track lighting—it’s time to finally say goodbye to that dated set hanging over your kitchen island and usher in a new vibe. With frequent clearance sales, this is also our go-to when it comes to saving big on practically anything for your home.

Rejuvenation

Folk Abigail Large Soft Cone Semi-Flush Pendant Light

Coridon Task Floor Lamp

The lighting designs offered at Rejuvenation will appeal to all tastes, whether you favor natural, ceramic materials, or smooth metals. The online retailer offers a great variety of outdoor lighting as well, if you’re looking to imbue some farmhouse-chic style into your exterior. At Rejuvenation you can also stock up on lighting accessories, like shades and smart LED light bulbs. Because many of Rejuvenation’s pieces come with a higher price tag, we recommend shopping here for large statement-making pieces that will become the focal point of your space.

Lumens

Bellhop Table Lamp by Edward Barber, Jay Osgerby for FLOS

Air Table Lamp by Ray Power for LZF

From kitchen to ceiling lights, Lumens—which recently merged with YLighting—focuses on modern options for brightening up your space. The designs span a wide variety of materials, from metals and woods to more fragile woven textiles. Plus you can even find landscape lighting for your entryway, backyard, and any other outdoor spot that needs extra illumination.

Schoolhouse

Arbor Floor Lamp

Schoolhouse x Clare V. Piet Table Lamp

Schoolhouse takes classic lighting shapes—pendants, circular flush mounts, tree-shaped table lamps—and gives them a bit of a one-up with fun colors and functional improvements. For example, a simple wall pendant gets a convenient makeover with a plug-in functionality and style inspired by Shaker designs. The brand is a great option for anyone into midcentury modern, Bauhaus, and similar design styles, but they’re not so trendy that you’ll want to swap them out after a few years.

Serena & Lily

Savannah Flush Mount

Bar Harbor Bone Inlay Table Lamp

One of the quickest ways to add visual interest to your living room or dining room is to incorporate an unexpected texture into your lighting design. Serena & Lily has a lot to choose from in this category, from woven wicker pendants to scalloped hanging lights. The vibe skews a bit bohemian and beachy, and it’s a great place to find a statement piece to help anchor your room.

Castlery

Nadia Ceramic Table Lamp

Faro Sculptural Floor Lamp

Castlery’s selection of lighting is small but mighty, offering table and floor lamps that are perfectly suited for minimalist or Scandi-inspired interiors. You’ll notice lots of marble, ceramic, and wood bases, which make any room feel more natural. And while the lighting is certainly on the trendy side, we appreciate that each feels timeless thanks to the neutral hues and smooth silhouettes.

Article

Gemma Rice Flushmount Ceiling Light

Leap Black Sconce

If you know you want modern decor, Article has a nice, curated selection of lighting that feels decidedly so. Each piece, whether it’s a floor lamp or table lantern like the Kana lamp above, won’t overpower your other decor but will still add a touch of warmth and style. Rattan pendants give tropical vibes, while ceramic terrazzo table lamps are fun for minimalist spaces.

Lulu & Georgia

Bemand Table Lamp

Ricardo Sconce

Lulu & Georgia has a chokehold on home design lovers, and for good reason. Each piece of furniture and decor is thoughtfully designed to make your space feel warmer and cozy. Their lighting options span categories, but you’ll find common themes, like dark wood bases and accents, rattan shades, and sculptural and organic shapes. The pendants and chandeliers are particularly striking and look perfect over a dining table or bed.

Amazon

Magnetic Motion Sensor Lights

EDISHINE Tripod Table Lamp

Much like Wayfair, you could spend days perusing the lighting options on Amazon. To make your search easier, zero in on a specific design element—like “glass lighting pendant”—to find a unique option at an affordable price. Another major perk to Amazon is that you can likely pick it up at your door faster than any other retailer. So, if you’re in a pinch or want to make a design switch-up ASAP, this is the ultimate hub for easy shopping and quick shipments.

Etsy

Handmade Chandelier

Handmade Wooden Vintage Table Lamp

The true magic of Etsy is that you can search for—and find—anything you’ve been looking for or dreamed up in your mind. Vintage or new, somehow, somewhere, it’s bound to be on Etsy. This pink mesh chandelier would perfectly suit a lively dining space, and this classic table lamp is a great bedside option.

Gantri

Muka Design Lab Argizari Table Light

Filippo Mambretti Noah Wall Light

Head to Gantri for the bold pops of color, perfect for livening up a dining room or a kid’s room. Spanning table, floor, and wall lights, this retailer injects a burst of personality into its cute and quirky designs—perfect for the young at heart. Plus the brand is known for using plant-based materials in its work instead of harmful plastics. Swap out a boring wall sconce or standard pendant with one of Gantri’s unique shapes and that might just satiate your desire to redecorate.

Anthropologie

Lulu Judarn Floor Lamp

Inizio Table Lamp

If your taste leans classic, vintage, and ornate, Anthropologie’s stunning lighting options should be your first stop. Rather than looking at lighting as a finishing touch to your home aesthetic, the retailer makes original, focal-point worthy lamps, sconces, and chandeliers that you might just center your whole room around. This milk glass bubble pendant, for example, adds a polished, elegant touch to a dark hallway or living room.

Mitzi

Jaimee Floor Lamp

Aisa Plug-in Sconce

Your home’s lighting should be fun; that may mean mixing and matching various materials…or opting for vanity lighting with a fun shape. Mitzi covers all of the bases, from simple sconces to pastel-hued chandeliers. Not to mention there are few flower-shaped, retro-inspired vanities that are this chic. And you can trust that they know a thing or two, because the brand specializes in lighting.

CB2

Nicholas Obeid Astr Wall Sconce

Polar White Cement Floor Lamp By Kara Mann

CB2’s curation of lighting focuses on big, bold, and handsome shapes. Large floor lamps, striking marble outdoor sconces, and brass pendants promise a dramatic but tasteful addition to your home. It’s a great middle-of-the-road option in terms of affordability, and because there are hundreds of lighting options to choose from, you’re pretty much guaranteed to find something that perfectly suits you.

Greenrow

Recycled Glass Pendant

Extending Taper Candle Holder

Greenrow offers some exceptional cottagecore options for those who can’t stop thinking of the Cotswolds. Their sconce shade collection is particularly cute, and we can’t get enough of their pleated lampshades. And, though it might not be a lamp, the extending taper candle holder is a real standout on the site.

Urban Outfitters

Orange Table Lamp

Little Glass Table Lamp

The ever rotating stock at Urban Outfitters is a good place to keep on the lookout for trendy table and floor lamps. From modern designs and textured lampshades to vintage-inspired silhouettes and ceramic task lamps, Urban Outfitters is a single stop that will appeal to many different lighting style preferences. The retailer specializes in kitsch and small space-friendly pieces, so scroll through if you’re looking for a teeny table lamp or tomato-shaped task light.

McGee & Co

Vedruna Table Lamp

Danica Wicker Pendant

If you consider yourself a person with classic taste—classic, neutrals, nothing fussy, nothing loud—McGee & Co is worth a deep dive. Their offerings span reasonable price points for both quality materials and stylistic longevity. The beauty of a classic look is that you’ll never tire of it. A wicker pendant is always going to look right above the broad kitchen table in a beach house, and the tasteful Mollino Semi-Flush Mount will always suit a foyer. And if you’re just looking to spruce up a side table, they have an ample table lamp collection, which we’ve featured in our dedicated roundup.

Lamps Plus

Portable Table Lamp

Torchiere Floor Lamp

Trust us, there is a world of ceiling fan designs out there. Lamps Plus is a great retailer for upgrading your fan situation, among many other things. The options lean more sculptural and will add a solid dose of texture and intrigue to your home decor. This is what we call lighting design, not just choosing yet another run-of-the-mill ceiling fan.

Joss & Main

Lillian Ceramic Table Lamp

Ceramic Table Lamp

If affordability is your main concern but you still have an eye for excellent design, Joss & Main does the practically impossible and combines budget-friendliness with chic pieces. The lighting styles are similar to what you’ll find at West Elm and CB2, with lots of metal shades, brass accents, arched silhouettes, and versatile shapes.

Pottery Barn

Everett Tube Sconce

Easton Forged-Iron Table Lamp

A tried-and-true source in the world of home essentials, Pottery Barn has it all—and that includes a top-notch selection of lighting. The brand even offers different collections with various types of lighting options in each one, guaranteeing that everything from your chandelier to desk lamp has a cohesive style. We also like Pottery Barn’s option to book a free design consultation if you’re moving into a new space and are feeling overwhelmed with all of the design possibilities.

West Elm

Ribbed Glass Table Lamp

Louis Table Lamp

The stock at West Elm is constantly updated, but you can always count on finding high-quality lighting options with a few quirky bursts of color thrown in, just for fun. We love West Elm’s lighting designs because it’s easy to stick to a color theme while switching up the shape and form of your lights from room to room. This is also a great place to look for items with a midcentury-modern feel to them. And for more guidance through the process, you can book an appointment to meet with an expert (virtually, in a store, or at your home) to talk through your lighting plans and any other home design decisions.

IKEA

Varmblixt Table / Wall Lamp

Isjakt Floor Uplighter / Reading Lamp

Forever our Scandinavian-design favorite, IKEA has a world of options when it comes to lighting design for your home. The retailer has designs for each room, spanning low-light floor lamps for an ultracozy ambiance to superbright LED options for work spaces. Within this category, you can find everything from classic lighting options to more off-the-wall, statement-making styles—all for surprisingly low prices.

1stDibs

Butterflies Ceiling by Studio Glustin

Fiori Sconces Signed by Jacques Jarrige (Set of 2)

Classic, modern, Bauhaus, maximalist… 1stDibs has any style you’re looking to add to your home. Heavily featured in our Open Door series, this retailer is a near-and-dear resource for interior designers searching for authentic vintage pieces. If Etsy’s a resource for everything you can think up, 1stDibs is a resource for everything you couldn’t begin to fathom—like this flush mount butterfly chandelier or these serpentine Fiori sconces.

AllModern

Mills Pendant

Rochelle Bath Bar

While AllModern, a Wayfair company, offers just as many options as its parent retailer, the aesthetic is more focused on minimal and—you guessed it—modern designs. Many of the designs are offered in lighting collections, meaning you can carry a singular lighting design scheme throughout your entire home for a cohesive design feel.

Design Within Reach

Tom Dixon Bell Lamp

Gubi Grasshopper Floor Lamp

If you’ve read our stories before, you know we’re suckers for Design Within Reach (also known as DWR). From the retailer’s stock of Eames chairs to their array of midcentury furnishings, we can’t get enough. Lighting-wise, luxury wall sconces, sleek ceiling fans, and unique table lamps are among the wide selection of lighting options available. The options available are as unique as they are timeless, and you can find something for nearly any corner of your home.

Herman Miller

Nelson Saucer Bubble Pendant

Nelson Cigar Lotus Table Lamp

The best-selling pieces from the Nelson Bubble Collection, including this pendant ceiling light, are made to create a soft glow in any room. You can find several contemporary designs—for lighting, furniture, and more—like these across Herman Miller’s site.

Hem

Alphabeta Pendant Uno

Knuckle Table Lamp

Hem’s clever use of bold colors flanked by neutral hues adds some visual interest to your lighting without going overboard. The retailer offers a handful of shapes when it comes to its pendant lighting in a world of color combinations. This is great, since you can mimic the same shape from room to room while swapping color palettes.

Noguchi

Akari 24N

Akari 2X

It just wouldn’t be an article on lighting if Isamu Noguchi’s paper lanterns didn’t make an appearance. While there are a million dupes circulating the internet, we wouldn’t trust the quality or avant-garde designs of Noguchi from anyone except his namesake museum shop. Akari 1A and Akari 7A are classics, but his canon includes playful shapes and colors at work for the more lighthearted space.
